last_episode_to_air.name: Anima-City
last_episode_to_air.overview: The mayor proves that a serum based on Michiru's blood cures Nirvasyl Syndrome, but Alan moves forward with his plan to "solve" the beastman problem.

name: BNA
original_name: BNA ビー・エヌ・エー
overview: Morphed into a raccoon beastman, Michiru seeks refuge, and answers, with the aid of wolf beastman Shirou inside the special zone of Anima-City.

episodes.name: Runaway Raccoon
episodes.overview: Fleeing persecution as a beastman, Michiru journeys to Anima-City, where she meets wolf Shirou amidst the celebrations for the city's 10th anniversary.

episodes.name: Rabbit Town
episodes.overview: Michiru can't prove she was human without her stolen student ID, so she heads to Rabbit Town to retrieve it. Shirou meets with the mayor.

episodes.name: Rhino Melancholy
episodes.overview: The mayor asks Shirou to investigate a series of bombings. Michiru talks her way into joining him, with the goal of protecting a medical center.

episodes.name: Dolphin Daydream
episodes.overview: Using an illegal SIM card, Michiru befriends influencer Nina, who's fascinated by humans. The two of them sneak out to a party in the human world.

episodes.name: Greedy Bears
episodes.overview: Though she prefers basketball, Michiru reluctantly joins a hard-luck baseball team whose hangdog coach is on the sports betting take.

episodes.name: Fox Waltz
episodes.overview: The Church of the Silver Wolf arrives in Anima-City. Michiru is shocked to learn that their leader is her friend Nazuna, who was once human like her.

episodes.name: Easy Albatross
episodes.overview: Michiru meets albatross beastman Pingua when he crash lands in her house. Shirou has an encounter with Alan Sylvasta in the mayor's office.

episodes.name: The Mole Rat Speaks
episodes.overview: After a visit from Boris, Yaba morphs into an uncontrollable beast form. The mayor tells Michiru the true history of the silver wolf.

episodes.name: Human Scapegoat
episodes.overview: While Shirou investigates what happened to Yaba, Michiru sneaks into the Sylvasta medical center after seeing Nazuna kidnapped once again.

episodes.name: Rabid Wolf
episodes.overview: Shirou and Michiru set out to subdue another monstrous beastman. After Sylvasta's machines interfere, Alan tells them about Nirvasyl Syndrome.

episodes.name: A Beastly Feast
episodes.overview: Nazuna decides to reveal she's human during her concert. While the mayor escapes detention in Japan, Shirou and Flip put their own plans into action.

episodes.name: Anima-City
episodes.overview: The mayor proves that a serum based on Michiru's blood cures Nirvasyl Syndrome, but Alan moves forward with his plan to "solve" the beastman problem.
